solution_line_template: Daria wants to buy tickets for four persons, so the cost will be {num_people} tickets * ${ticket_cost}/ticket = $<<{num_people}*{ticket_cost}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
Daria currently has ${current_money}, so she needs ${total_cost} - ${current_money} = $<<{total_cost}-{current_money}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} more.
